UtenlandsoppholdSteg.InfoFodsel: To be entitled to a lump-sum grant, you must be a member of the National Insurance Scheme at the time of birth
UtenlandsoppholdSteg.InfoAdopsjon: To be entitled to a lump-sum grant, you must be a member of the National Insurance Scheme at the time of taking over care by adoption.
UtenlandsoppholdSteg.Siste12Måneder.Spør: Where have you lived in the last 12 months?
UtenlandsoppholdSteg.Siste12Måneder.IsRe: You must state where you have lived in the last 12 months
UtenlandsoppholdSteg.Siste12MånederInfot: Lived abroad in whole or in part
UtenlandsoppholdSteg.Neste12Måneder.Spør: Where are you going to live for the next 12 months?
UtenlandsoppholdSteg.Neste12Måneder.IsRe: You must enter where you are going to live for the next 12 months
UtenlandsoppholdSteg.Neste12MånederInfot: Stay abroad in whole or in part
UtenlandsoppholdSteg.StotteFraNav: Stays abroad and support from NAV
UtenlandsoppholdSteg.Info.Del1: To be entitled to support from NAV, you must be a member of Norwegian National Insurance Scheme. People who live in Norway are usually members of the Norwegian National Insurance
UtenlandsoppholdSteg.Info.Del2: Whether you keep your membership in the National Insurance Scheme during your stay abroad depends on where you will be staying and how long you will be there.
UtenlandsoppholdSteg.Info.Del3: When you will be abroad for more than 12 months, we consider you to be resident abroad according to the Norwegian National Insurance Act's rules. The same applies if you will be abroad for more than 6 months a year for 2 or more consecutive calendar years.
UtenlandsoppholdSteg.Info.Del4: You are no longer a member of the National Insurance Scheme when you are considered resident abroad.
UtenlandsoppholdSteg.Info.Del5: When you are on holiday abroad, you are considered a tourist and retain your membership in the national insurance, if you have no income from work during your stay and your stay does not last longer than 12 months. As long as you are a member of the National Insurance Scheme, you generally retain the benefit.
UtenlandsoppholdSteg.Info.Del6: You can read more about stays abroad at
TidligereUtenlandsoppholdSteg.Validering: You can't have several stays abroad during the same period
TidligereUtenlandsoppholdSteg.Spørsmål.H: What country did you live in?
TidligereUtenlandsoppholdSteg.LeggTilUte: You must select the countries you are staying in.
You must choose an as of date
TidligereUtenlandsoppholdSteg.FomErLikTo: As of date cannot be the same as even date
TidligereUtenlandsoppholdSteg.LeggTilUte: You must choose an even date
TidligereUtenlandsoppholdSteg.TomErLikFo: Even date cannot be the same as as of date
TidligereUtenlandsoppholdSteg.FraOgMedDa: As of and including date must be a valid date in the format dd.mm.yyyy
TidligereUtenlandsoppholdSteg.TilOgMedDa: Even and including date must be a valid date in the format dd.mm.yyyy
TidligereUtenlandsoppholdSteg.DateOutsid: As of and including date of stay abroad must be between {min} and {max}
Even and including date of stay abroad must be between {min} and {max}
TidligereUtenlandsoppholdSteg.Utenlandso: The date has to before the to date
The date has to be after the from date
